example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EFSFileSystem
CreationTime : 5/26/2015 4:02:38 PM CreationToken : 1a2bff54-85e0-4747-bd95-7bc172c4f555 FileSystemId : fs-1a2b3c4d LifeCycleState : available Name : NumberOfMountTargets : 0 OwnerId : 123456789012 SizeInBytes : Amazon.ElasticFileSystem.Model.FileSystemSize
CreationTime : 5/26/2015 4:06:23 PM CreationToken : 2b4daa14-85e0-4747-bd95-7bc172c4f555 FileSystemId : fs-4d3c2b1a ...
example.description: Returns the collection of all file systems owned by the caller's account in the region.
Returns the details of the specified file system.
Returns the details of a file system using the idempotency creation token that was specified at the time the file system was created.
